mapper.sql: MANAGER_ID, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_TEL, MANAGER_TYPE, MANAGER_ACCOUNT, MANAGER_PWD, MANAGER_COND, MANAGER_TITLE, MANAGER_DETAIL, MANAGER_RATEDNUM, MANAGER_SELECTED,MANAGER_STATE, MANAGER_SEX,MANAGER_MENTORTYPE,MANAGER_MAJOR
mapper.insert: insert into SCOTT.MANAGER_INFO (MANAGER_ID, MANAGER_NAME, MANAGER_TEL, MANAGER_TYPE, MANAGER_ACCOUNT, MANAGER_PWD, MANAGER_COND, MANAGER_TITLE, MANAGER_DETAIL, MANAGER_RATEDNUM, MANAGER_SELECTED) values (#{managerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerRatednum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{managerSelected,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update SCOTT.MANAGER_INFO
MANAGER_NAME = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGER_TEL = #{managerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGER_TYPE = #{managerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGER_ACCOUNT = #{managerAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGER_PWD = #{managerPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGER_COND = #{managerCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGER_TITLE = #{managerTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGER_DETAIL = #{managerDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGER_RATEDNUM = #{managerRatednum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MANAGER_SELECTED = #{managerSelected,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MANAGER_ID = #{managerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update SCOTT.MANAGER_INFO set MANAGER_NAME = #{managerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_TEL = #{managerTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_TYPE = #{managerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_ACCOUNT = #{managerAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_PWD = #{managerPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_COND = #{managerCond,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_TITLE = #{managerTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_DETAIL = #{managerDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_RATEDNUM = #{managerRatednum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MANAGER_SELECTED = #{managerSelected,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MANAGER_ID = #{managerId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select FROM MANAGER_INFO
MANAGER_NAME like '%' ||#{managerName}||'%'
and MANAGER_TITLE = #{managerTitle}
and MANAGER_TYPE != '1'

SELECT B.MANAGER_NAME,B.MANAGER_TEL,B.MANAGER_COND,A.STU_STATE FROM STU_INFO A,MANAGER_INFO B
A.MANAGER_ID = B.MANAGER_ID(+)
and STU_ID = #{stuId}
1>2
mapper.update:
update MANAGER_INFO
MANAGER_NAME = #{managerName},
MANAGER_TEL = #{managerTel},
MANAGER_SEX = #{managerSex},
MANAGER_DETAIL = #{managerDetail},
MANAGER_MENTORTYPE =#{managerMentortype},
MANAGER_MAJOR = #{managerMajor},
MANAGER_COND = #{managerCond},
MANAGER_PWD = #{managerPwd},
MANAGER_STATE = '2'
MANAGER_ID = #{managerId}
1>2
mapper.select: select MANAGER_SELECTED from MANAGER_INFO where MANAGER_ID = #{managerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select a.* from STU_INFO a,MANAGER_INFO b
a.MANAGER_ID = b.MANAGER_ID
and b.MANAGER_ID = #{managerId}
and STU_NAME like '%'||#{stuName}||'%'
and STU_TEL like '%'||#{stuTel}||'%'

select FROM MANAGER_INFO
where MANAGER_TYPE != '1' and MANAGER_TYPE != '-1'
mapper.update:
update MANAGER_INFO
MANAGER_NAME = #{managerName},
MANAGER_TEL = #{managerTel},
MANAGER_COND = #{managerCond},
MANAGER_RATEDNUM = #{managerRatednum},
MANAGER_TITLE = #{managerTitle},
MANAGER_MENTORTYPE = #{managerMentortype},
MANAGER_Major = #{managerMajor},
MANAGER_ID = #{managerId}
1>2

update MANAGER_INFO set (MANAGER_TYPE) = ( case when MANAGER_TYPE = '2' then '${managerType}' when MANAGER_TYPE !='$managerType}' and MANAGER_TYPE !='2' then '33' when MANAGER_TYPE = '${managerType}' then '${managerType}' end )where MANAGER_ID = '${managerId}'
